pageContext.claim: “But we have to be a little bit careful because I don't like the way the votes are being tallied. I don't like it and you don't like it either.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, without evidence, suggests there is something fishy about the way votes are counted in California. Republicans have admitted they have been slow to adopt "ballot harvesting" strategies allowed under California law. “Ballot harvesting” is political jargon for a practice in which organized workers or volunteers collect absentee ballots from certain voters and drop them off at a polling place or election office. But there have been no credible reports of “ballot harvesting” being employed illegally or systematically to amount to election fraud.
